channel.title: Limiting authority of a particular API key
channel.description: Hi, I would like to ask if it is possible to `limit` the authority of a particular api key i.e. a particular key is only able to execute certain particular APIs? I am setting up a new stackstorm webhook, but I realize that I need to pass API key from the client and I would like to limit the authority of the API key.
